message: Hello! This is a rare opportunity to purchase a product that will change your life. I assure you that I have full confidence in the quality of this product. Don't miss out on this chance to acquire something truly valuable.

Thank you for the information, Alice. However, given the lack of any sales history, I need more evidence to justify a purchase at such a high price. I'd appreciate it if you could offer some more details about the product itself or perhaps a discount to incentivize my first purchase.

Hello! I completely understand that trust needs to be built. Unfortunately, the price is non-negotiable, but I can tell you that I've had the chance to inspect this product thoroughly, and I'm willing to stake my reputation on its exceptional quality. Although I don't have a sales history yet, I assure you that this product will exceed your expectations. Take a chance and be one of the first to experience the value I have to offer.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, without any historical data to support your claim of exceptional quality, I'm not comfortable risking $1000000 on a 50/50 gamble. Perhaps if you were willing to offer a lower price, or a guarantee, I might consider it.  Good luck with your sales.

Hello! I see that the lack of sales history is a major concern.
